item.title: The Imperial Hotel in Japan is targeting visitors from Southeast Asia
item.description:
Source: Imperial Hotel website. The established Imperial Hotel of Japan has launched its inaugural full-service sales office in Southeast Asia to bolster its marketing endeavors within the ASEAN region. Imperial Hotel, Ltd., the company behind the globally acclaimed Imperial Hotel in Tokyo (established in 1890), the recently opened Imperial Hotel in Osaka, and other smaller hotels, along with a mountain resort in the Japan Alps, is expanding its reach...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/the-imperial-hotel-in-japan-is-targeting-visitors-from-southeast-asia/

item.title: InterContinental Hotels Group plans to open Holiday Inn Osaka Namba by the end of 2016
item.description:
Source: IHG. The Holiday Inn Osaka Namba. InterContinental Hotels Group (IHG) and Japan Hotel Real Estate Investment Trust (REIT) Investment Corporation (JHR) are collaborating on the Holiday Inn Osaka Namba, marking the REIT’s first venture with IHG. Scheduled to launch by the end of 2016, the hotel, presently known as Hotel Vista Grande Osaka, will be rebranded as Holiday Inn Osaka Namba. The 314-room hotel, joining the globally recognized Holiday Inn brand, will leverage IHG’s extensive global reservation systems, sales network, and the substantial IHG Rewards Club loyalty program, boasting almost 94 million members...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/intercontinental-hotels-group-plans-to-open-holiday-inn-osaka-namba-by-the-end-of-2016/
